mapper.select: /*bulletin.selectBulletinConfig*/ SELECT A.BANNER_USE_YN, A.BULLETIN_MNG_SEQ, A.BULLETIN_NM, A.BULLETIN_RANGE_CD, A.BULLETIN_TYPE_CD, A.CATE_USE_YN, A.COMMENT_YN, A.CONTENT, A.CREATE_DT, A.DEL_YN, A.EMPLOY_YN, A.FILE_GRP_CD, A.FILE_QTY, A.FILE_SIZE, A.FILE_YN, A.JOBSK_YN, A.LIKE_YN, A.MENU_CD, A.MENU_CD_DIV, A.MOD_DT, A.MOD_USER_SEQ, A.REG_DT, A.REG_USER_SEQ, A.STDT_YN, A.TRNNG_INSTT_YN, A.USE_YN, A.USER_AUTH_CD FROM CPES_BULLETIN_MNG A WHERE A.BULLETIN_MNG_SEQ = #{condBulletinMngSeq} AND A.USE_YN = 'Y'

/*bulletin.selectBulletinConfigType*/ SELECT A.BANNER_USE_YN, A.BULLETIN_MNG_SEQ, A.BULLETIN_NM, A.BULLETIN_RANGE_CD, A.BULLETIN_TYPE_CD, A.CATE_USE_YN, A.COMMENT_YN, A.CONTENT, A.CREATE_DT, A.DEL_YN, A.EMPLOY_YN, A.FILE_GRP_CD, A.FILE_QTY, A.FILE_SIZE, A.FILE_YN, A.JOBSK_YN, A.LIKE_YN, A.MENU_CD, A.MENU_CD_DIV, A.MOD_DT, A.MOD_USER_SEQ, A.REG_DT, A.REG_USER_SEQ, A.STDT_YN, A.TRNNG_INSTT_YN, A.USE_YN, A.USER_AUTH_CD FROM CPES_BULLETIN_MNG A WHERE A.BULLETIN_TYPE_CD = #{condBulletinTypeCd} AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY A.REG_DT DESC LIMIT 1

/*bulletin.selectBulletin*/ SELECT B.AGREE_YN, B.BULLETIN_MNG_SEQ, B.BULLETIN_SEQ, B.BULLETIN_TYPE_CD, B.COMMENT_CNT, CASE WHEN UPPER(#{langCd}) = 'KH' THEN B.CONTENT_KH ELSE B.CONTENT_EN END AS CONTENT, B.CONTENT_EN, B.CONTENT_KH, B.DEPTH, B.FILE_GRP_SEQ, B.JC_CD, B.LIKE_CNT, B.MOD_DT, B.MOD_USER_SEQ, B.NTC_YN, FN_GET_BASE_DATE_CHAR(B.REG_DT,#{langCd}) AS REG_DT, B.REG_USER_SEQ, B.SORT, CASE WHEN UPPER(#{langCd}) = 'KH' THEN B.TITLE_KH ELSE B.TITLE_EN END AS TITLE, B.TITLE_EN, B.TITLE_KH, B.BULLETIN_CATE_SEQ, B.VIEW_CNT, B.VIEW_YN, (SELECT LIKE_SEQ FROM CPES_LIKE WHERE TABLE_KEY_SEQ = B.BULLETIN_SEQ AND USER_SEQ = #{condUserSeq}) AS LIKE_SEQ, FN_GET_LIKE_YN(#{condUserSeq}, #{condLikeCateCd}, B.BULLETIN_SEQ) AS LIKE_YN, B.BULLETIN_ID, FN_GET_USER_NM_BY_USER_SEQ(B.REG_USER_SEQ, #{langCd}) AS REG_NM, CASE WHEN B.REG_USER_SEQ = #{condUserSeq} THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS MODIFY_YN FROM CPES_BULLETIN_MNG A INNER JOIN CPES_BULLETIN B ON A.BULLETIN_MNG_SEQ = B.BULLETIN_MNG_SEQ INNER JOIN CPES_USER C ON B.REG_USER_SEQ = C.USER_SEQ WHERE A.BULLETIN_MNG_SEQ = #{condBulletinMngSeq} AND B.BULLETIN_SEQ = #{condSeq} AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND B.DEL_YN = 'N' AND C.DEL_YN = 'N'

/*bulletin.selectListCnt*/ SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM CPES_BULLETIN_MNG A INNER JOIN CPES_BULLETIN B ON A.BULLETIN_MNG_SEQ = B.BULLETIN_MNG_SEQ INNER JOIN CPES_USER C ON B.REG_USER_SEQ = C.USER_SEQ WHERE A.BULLETIN_MNG_SEQ = #{condBulletinMngSeq}

/*bulletin.selectBulletinList*/ SELECT B.AGREE_YN, B.BULLETIN_MNG_SEQ, B.BULLETIN_SEQ, B.BULLETIN_TYPE_CD, B.COMMENT_CNT, CASE WHEN UPPER(#{langCd}) = 'KH' THEN B.CONTENT_KH ELSE B.CONTENT_EN END AS CONTENT, B.DEPTH, B.FILE_GRP_SEQ, B.LIKE_CNT, B.MOD_DT, B.MOD_USER_SEQ, B.NTC_YN, FN_GET_BASE_DATE_CHAR(B.REG_DT,#{langCd}) AS REG_DT, B.REG_USER_SEQ, B.SORT, CASE WHEN UPPER(#{langCd}) = 'KH' THEN B.TITLE_KH ELSE B.TITLE_EN END AS TITLE, B.VIEW_CNT, B.VIEW_YN, FN_GET_NEW_YN(B.REG_DT) AS NEW_YN, (SELECT LIKE_SEQ FROM CPES_LIKE WHERE TABLE_KEY_SEQ = B.BULLETIN_SEQ AND USER_SEQ = #{condUserSeq}) AS LIKE_SEQ, FN_GET_LIKE_YN(#{condUserSeq}, #{condLikeCateCd}, B.BULLETIN_SEQ) AS LIKE_YN, B.BULLETIN_ID, FN_GET_USER_NM_BY_USER_SEQ(B.REG_USER_SEQ, #{langCd}) AS REG_NM, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM CPES_COMMENT D WHERE D.BULLETIN_SEQ = B.BULLETIN_SEQ AND D.DEL_YN = 'N') AS COMMENT_CNT FROM CPES_BULLETIN_MNG A INNER JOIN CPES_BULLETIN B ON A.BULLETIN_MNG_SEQ = B.BULLETIN_MNG_SEQ INNER JOIN CPES_USER C ON B.REG_USER_SEQ = C.USER_SEQ WHERE A.BULLETIN_MNG_SEQ = #{condBulletinMngSeq}
LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}

/*bulletin.selectBulletinCateList*/ SELECT A.BULLETIN_MNG_SEQ, A.BULLETIN_CATE_NM, A.BULLETIN_CATE_SEQ, A.SORT FROM CPES_BULLETIN_CATE A WHERE A.BULLETIN_MNG_SEQ = #{condBulletinMngSeq} ORDER BY A.SORT

/*bulletin.selectBulletinPre*/ SELECT B.BULLETIN_SEQ, CASE WHEN UPPER(#{langCd}) = 'KH' THEN B.TITLE_KH ELSE B.TITLE_EN END AS TITLE, B.VIEW_CNT, FN_GET_BASE_DATE_CHAR(B.REG_DT,#{langCd}) AS REG_DT, B.BULLETIN_ID, 'Y' AS NEXT_YN FROM CPES_BULLETIN_MNG A INNER JOIN CPES_BULLETIN B ON A.BULLETIN_MNG_SEQ = B.BULLETIN_MNG_SEQ INNER JOIN CPES_USER C ON B.REG_USER_SEQ = C.USER_SEQ WHERE B.BULLETIN_ID < CAST(#{condBulletinId} AS UNSIGNED) AND B.BULLETIN_MNG_SEQ = #{condBulletinMngSeq}
LIMIT 1

/*bulletin.selectBulletinNext*/ SELECT B.BULLETIN_SEQ, CASE WHEN UPPER(#{langCd}) = 'KH' THEN B.TITLE_KH ELSE B.TITLE_EN END AS TITLE, B.VIEW_CNT, FN_GET_BASE_DATE_CHAR(B.REG_DT,#{langCd}) AS REG_DT, B.BULLETIN_ID, 'Y' AS NEXT_YN FROM CPES_BULLETIN_MNG A INNER JOIN CPES_BULLETIN B ON A.BULLETIN_MNG_SEQ = B.BULLETIN_MNG_SEQ INNER JOIN CPES_USER C ON B.REG_USER_SEQ = C.USER_SEQ WHERE B.BULLETIN_ID > CAST(#{condBulletinId} AS UNSIGNED) AND B.BULLETIN_MNG_SEQ = #{condBulletinMngSeq}
LIMIT 1

/*bulletin.selectCommentList*/ SELECT A.BULLETIN_SEQ, A.COMMENT_SEQ, A.CONTENT, FN_GET_BASE_DATE_CHAR(A.REG_DT,#{langCd}) AS REG_DT, A.UPPER_COMMENT_SEQ, A.DEPTH, A.SORT, A.COMMENT_ID, FN_GET_USER_NM_BY_USER_SEQ(A.REG_USER_SEQ, #{langCd}) AS REG_NM, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM CPES_COMMENT C WHERE C.UPPER_COMMENT_SEQ = A.COMMENT_SEQ AND C.DEL_YN = 'N') AS COMMENT_CNT, CASE WHEN A.REG_USER_SEQ = #{condUserSeq} THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS MODIFY_YN FROM CPES_COMMENT A WHERE A.BULLETIN_SEQ = #{condSeq} AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND ((A.VIEW_YN = 'Y' AND A.AGREE_YN = 'Y') OR A.REG_USER_SEQ = #{condUserSeq}) AND A.DEPTH = #{condDepth} ORDER BY A.COMMENT_ID DESC LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}

/*bulletin.selectCommentReplyList*/ SELECT A.BULLETIN_SEQ, A.COMMENT_SEQ, A.CONTENT, FN_GET_BASE_DATE_CHAR(A.REG_DT,#{langCd}) AS REG_DT, A.UPPER_COMMENT_SEQ, A.DEPTH, A.SORT, A.COMMENT_ID, FN_GET_USER_NM_BY_USER_SEQ(A.REG_USER_SEQ, #{langCd}) AS REG_NM, CASE WHEN A.REG_USER_SEQ = #{condUserSeq} THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS MODIFY_YN FROM CPES_COMMENT A WHERE A.BULLETIN_SEQ = #{condSeq} AND A.UPPER_COMMENT_SEQ = #{condUpperSeq} AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.DEPTH = #{condDepth} ORDER BY A.COMMENT_ID DESC
